95498162-48d1-4ec5-b6f8-8560f1f0e426.description: Earners of this badge can reconstruct event timelines from network traffic and accurately correlate, or distinguish between, event threads. They have the skills to identify and extract network artifacts for further forensic analysis and perform packet analysis and open-source research to attribute activity to a user or network.

f1096111-8c1d-4cfc-a023-b7610db59c3d.description: Earners of this badge are able to perform analysis on both plaintext and encrypted network traffic. Additionally, the badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in assessing a running operating system using a range of command-line and GUI-based tools.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 40-hour Introduction to C++ Programming course from Focal Point Academy
Successfully complete 15+ hands-on C++ Programming lab exercises
Achieve a passing score on the Introduction to C++ Programming post-test
Successfully complete the practical capstone exercise for the Introduction to C++ Programming course

9d47252f-bfd3-4221-8163-417f0f3d58fe.description: Earners of this badge can identify malware running on a live system and efficiently perform triage analysis to determine its characteristics, functionality and potential damage to an organization. They are adept at using dynamic analysis tools to observe malware behavior and report findings in a clear, concise manner.
9d47252f-bfd3-4221-8163-417f0f3d58fe.name: Malware Triage Analyst

issuer.summary: issued by Focal Point Data Risk

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 5-day Endpoint Live Forensics Course from Focal Point Academy
Complete the 5-day Behavioral Malware Analysis course from Focal Point Academy

7249d197-2dcf-435d-9bb3-d4e76bdad4e7.description: Earners of this badge can analyze unobfuscated assembly code to determine the scope and capabilities of a given binary. They understand program flow, data structures and other programming concepts, and can assert their knowledge in a systematic approach to break up larger programs/systems for analysis.
7249d197-2dcf-435d-9bb3-d4e76bdad4e7.name: Reverse Engineer I

issuer.summary: issued by Focal Point Data Risk

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Behavioral Malware Analysis 5-day course from Focal Point Academy
Complete the Assembly for Reverse Engineers 5-day course from Focal Point Academy
Complete the Malware Reverse Engineering 5-day course from Focal Point Academy

03d765bb-9029-4ee3-ba5d-211a186b52bf.description: Earners of this badge have advanced reverse engineering skills and are able to use a combination of static and dynamic techniques to efficiently reverse engineer large or complex binaries that may include API obfuscation and other anti-analysis techniques. They can also implement objective-oriented analysis to focus on specific portions or behaviors within a program.
03d765bb-9029-4ee3-ba5d-211a186b52bf.name: Reverse Engineer II

issuer.summary: issued by Focal Point Data Risk

badge_template_activities.title: Reverse Engineer I
Complete the Python for Reverse Engineers 5-day course from Focal Point Academy
Complete the Linux/C++ Reverse Engineering 5-day course from Focal Point Academy

945a74b1-e489-4b58-8746-a7a2154839b2.description: Earners of the Threat Hunter I badge have the ability to proactively identify and track cyber threats in enterprise networks, extract indicators of compromise (IOCs), and incorporate these into new rules and signatures. They can synthesize their knowledge of offensive security tactics and sources of threat intelligence to anticipate and seek out malicious activity at multiple levels of the IT infrastructure stack.
945a74b1-e489-4b58-8746-a7a2154839b2.name: Threat Hunter I

issuer.summary: issued by Focal Point Data Risk

badge_template_activities.title: Cyber Threat Analyst II
Complete the Hacker Methodologies for Security Professionals 5-day course from Focal Point Academy
Complete the Threat Hunting with Python 3-day course from Focal Point Academy
